tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name TEXT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  weather_forecast TEXT,
  water_requirement FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE Crop ( crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, crop_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, planting_date DATE NOT NULL, irrigation_required BOOLEAN NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast ( forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE NOT NULL, temperature FLOAT NOT NULL, humidity FLOAT NOT NULL, precipitation FLOAT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule ( schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_id INT REFERENCES Crop(crop_id) NOT NULL, forecast_id INT REFERENCES WeatherForecast(forecast_id) NOT NULL, irrigation_date DATE NOT NULL, irrigation_duration INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    crop_id INT,
    forecast VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id UUID NOT NULL,
    forecast_id UUID NOT NULL,
    irrigation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    duration INT NOT NULL
);
